name: Drow
description: Drow, also known as dark elves, are a subrace of elves that dwell in the Underdark. They are known for their dark skin, white hair, and affinity for magic and stealth.

traits.Extended Darkvision: The range of your Darkvision increases to 120 feet.

Drow Spells.description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip. You also always have certain spells prepared and can cast them once per day without expending a spell slot. You can also cast them using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
